_jwt_config_legacy: JWT Authentication (Being Deprecated - Use for existing integrations only)

_instructions.client_id: Get from Adobe Developer Console > Project > Credentials
_instructions.client_secret: Get from Adobe Developer Console > Project > Credentials
_instructions.org_id: Get from Adobe Developer Console > Project Overview (format: ABC123@AdobeOrg)
_instructions.sandbox_name: Use 'prod' for production or your sandbox name (e.g., 'dev', 'staging')
_instructions.scopes: OAuth scopes - use default list or customize based on API needs
_instructions.technical_account_id: (JWT only) Get from Adobe Developer Console > Service Account
_instructions.private_key_path: (JWT only) Path to your private.key file downloaded from Adobe I/O

_setup_instructions.step_1: Go to Adobe Developer Console: https://developer.adobe.com/console
_setup_instructions.step_2: Create new project or select existing project
_setup_instructions.step_4_jwt: Or select 'Service Account (JWT)' for legacy auth (being deprecated)
_setup_instructions.step_5: Copy client_id, client_secret, and org_id from the credential page
_setup_instructions.step_6: Update this config file with your values
_setup_instructions.step_7: For JWT: Download private.key and update private_key_path
_setup_instructions.step_8: Verify sandbox_name matches your target environment
